_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
Saturday February 7th 2026 | 5:32

Bonjour Tremblant!

Happy Saturday! We have a solid 10 cm of fresh snow that fell in the last 24 hours, with another 1–2 cm expected through the morning, turning the mountain into our classic winter playground. By now, we’re used to winter and cold temperatures, but it’s still worth bundling up! It is a chilly this morning out here and strong winds across the peaks make it feel even colder, so cover any exposed skin and keep frostbite off your to-do list.

With 100% of the terrain open, you’ve got the entire mountain at your fingertips: explore new lines, lap your favorites, or take on every run you’ve been eyeing. All four Snow Parks are open and riding great, filled with creative features and flowing lines for progression or just plain fun, while 17 Glade Trails deliver those tight lines, fresh pockets, and natural terrain that keeps you coming back! Finally, with longer daylight stretching the afternoons, the Télécabine, Duncan, and Soleil lifts will be running until 4:00 p.m., giving you extra time to rack up laps and enjoy the snow. Snow is fresh, lifts are spinning; go make it count!

Mountain safety tip of the week:  Slow down in reduced-speed zones.
These zones require lower speeds for your safety and the safety of others.
 
Snow fall is recorded daily at 5 a.m from mid-mountain at North Side (550 m / 1,800 ft). This data, based on 24 hours, provides a picture of on-mountain conditions. Actual accumulation may differ from the official report. Be aware of changing conditions. Lifts and trails exist in a mountain environment and may close due to weather, usage and/or special maintenance.
_inspectorSnowReport.Alert:
In order to respond to the cold weather forecast for early morning
Here is some information about the operations on Sunday, february 8th, 2026.

-Duncan lift and Soleil lift, opening gradually

-On the south side first track by the Telecabine express

-On the North side, the first tracks by Expo and Lowell Thomas.

-Casino Express in operation at 7:30
_inspectorSnowReport.SafetyReport: Happy Saturday! We received 10 cm of fresh snow in the last 24 hours! With 100% of the terrain open, all skiers and riders can enjoy the mountain. All four Snow Parks and 17 Glade Trails are accessible, offering plenty of options for every style. Additionally, the Télécabine, Duncan, and Soleil lifts will operate until 4:00 p.m. Temperatures are very cold with strong winds, so be sure to bundle up and protect exposed skin.
_inspectorSnowReport.SafetyReportFrench: Bon samedi!10 cm de neige fraîche sont tombés au cours des dernières 24 heures! Avec 100 % du terrain ouvert, les quatre parcs à neige et 17 pistes de sous-bois sont accessibles, offrant de nombreuses options pour tous les styles. De plus, les remontées Télécabine, Duncan et Soleil fonctionneront jusqu’à 16 h. Les températures sont froides avec des vents forts, alors couvrez-vous bien!
